description: i can baerly hear the sound

Trying to find a MIDI Visualizer that works on Linux for learning piano is difficult in 2024 as many projects are dead or behind updates, and some dropped Linux altogether.

Enter Neothesia! Still new, and on Kubuntu I notice a bit of drawing lag in KDE when a notification draws over it. I can work around this by moving it to a second screen. Otherwise it just works out of the box!
summary: A MIDI Visualizer that works on modern Linux
